content:

title: Now It’s Paying To Catch Up
description: The year 2025 was definitely the year of artificial intelligence. It was the year that saw firms like Nvidia, Oracle, Palantir and global equities as a whole run up on demand over AI. But the Indian market? Not so much. At a time when global markets have registered favourable gains thanks to sustained fervour surrounding AI, the Indian market has been a bit of an outlier.
content:
Few will debate that 2025 has been the year of artificial intelligence. The year saw global firms like Nvidia, Oracle, Palantir run up and how. The story was, however, a little different for India.
The Indian market, where large tech companies are es... [5095 chars]

title: Venturing into the "Robotics + Artificial Intelligence" Frontier Shenzhen Kingkey Smart Agriculture Times Strategically Invests in Huibo Robotics
description: HONG KONG, Dec. 31, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- On the evening of December 30th, Shenzhen Kingkey Smart Agriculture Times (stock code: a000048) announced the formal signing of an《Equity Investment Intention Agreement》with Jiangsu Huibo Robotics Technology Co., Ltd. ('Huibo Robotics'). Shenzhen Kingkey Smart Agriculture Times intends to acquire a controlling stake through a capital increase and equity transfer, and will jointly establish an 'Embodied Robotics Research Institute' with Huibo Robotics' core team, led by Academician Sun Li Ning. This marks a significant step for the listed company, whose primary business is hog raising, into cutting-edge technology fields such as robotics, Embodied Intelligence, and Artificial Intelligence. Shenzhen Kingkey Smart Agriculture Times is officially entering the burgeoning field of AI and robotics integration, establishing a foundation for its second growth curve.
content: HONG KONG, Dec. 31, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- On the evening of December 30th, Shenzhen Kingkey Smart Agriculture Times (stock code: a000048) announced the formal signing of an《Equity Investment Intention Agreement》with Jiangsu Huibo Robotics Technology C... [7170 chars]

title: Inside Meta’s big bet on new AI technology
description: Meta, the company that owns Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp, has agreed to buy a fast-growing artificial intelligence company called Manus. The deal is reported to be worth more than US$2bil (RM8.1bil), making it one of Meta's bigger purchases ever.

title: Hindustan copper share price tanks 3%: What's behind the fall?
description: Copper prices have risen sharply this year due to supply disruptions at key global mines and strong demand from sectors such as electrification, renewable energy and artificial intelligence-led infrastructure.
content:
Shares of Hindustan Copper fell nearly 3% in Tuesday’s trade as investors chose to book profits after the stock’s sharp rise in recent weeks.
